message: It was a true pleasure collaborating with Nozrul. The book cover is both eye-catching and unique. Every detail, including the typography and color, has been thoughtfully arranged to draw attention. If you need a skilled, professional, and highly creative designer, stop looking. Nozrul is genuinely a master of his craft, and I'm incredibly thankful for the stunning cover he designed for my book.Thank you!

message: nozrulislam2020 was FANTASTIC to work with! He made the deadline early, he was very communicative and provided extra product than was requested. I increased his fee as a token of my satisfaction. I highly recommend his services and will absolutely use him again when the need arises.

name: josembos

name: jornokello
message: I loved to work with Nozrulislsm2020. The quality of design and development is awesome.

name: John H
message: This is my first time using Fiverr and my experience with Nozrul I could not have been better. I had a vague idea of what I wanted and he was able to give me a range of high-quality options to choose from. I showed the design concepts he created to several people to get their input and we all agreed that we could have gone with any of the options he presented. I am incredibly satisfied with the end product and would highly recommend him to others interested in this style of cover. I will definitely work with him in the future.
